column4: what should i choose, 32 bit or 64 bit ubuntu (amd64 6000 cpu)
It depends on the amount of RAM you have, mostly.
If you have >3GB of RAM, I suggest 64 bit. There are some disadvantages, but if you're tech savvy you should be able to work around them no problem.
With 2GB of RAM, you will probably get only a very small benefit from running 64-bit.
